# Ziemiany, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Ziemiany  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Banie Mazurskie, within Gołdap County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia. It lies approximately  north-east of Banie Mazurskie,  west of Gołdap, and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
